slide1.title: Make new friends with pet owners. Go for joint walks.

slide2.title: All useful locations in one app: vet clinics, parks, and much more.

slide3.title: Choose trusted professionals for various services: grooming, dog trainers, etc.

slide4.title: Stay up to date with all pet events.

slide1.title: Welcome to PetMap!
slide1.subtitle: Choose the app language so we can understand each other better.

slide2.title: Start setting up your profile right now
slide2.subtitle: And receive your first bonuses after registration to exchange them for gifts.

slide3.title: Tell us a little about yourself
slide3.subtitle: Your profile will be visible to other pet owners.

slide4.title: Set up your pet's profile
slide4.subtitle: Your pet's profile will be visible to others when responding to a walk.

slide5.title: What interests you?
slide5.subtitle: This will help you find suitable content.

onboardingProfile.alertMessage: If you skip onboarding, you will not receive bonuses and will not be able to use the map until you complete your profile.

congratulations.title: You have completed the initial registration!
congratulations.subtitle: Well done! Your profile is now activated. Get your first bonuses

signUpPasswordReset.title: Reset Password
